original_title: Globally renowned networking guru Dr. Ivan Misner arrives in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Dr. Ivan Misner, the globally celebrated visionary behind Business Network International (BNI) and renowned as the “Father of Modern Networking,” arrived in Sri Lanka on Sunday.

His arrival has sparked anticipation and excitement among business professionals and entrepreneurs across the country. As a leading influential figure in the field of networking, Dr. Misner’s will take part in several events that will provide valuable insights and strategies for business owners and leaders for harnessing the power of networking to drive business growth and success, thereby giving a significant opportunity for individuals and organisations to learn from his expertise and take their networking endeavours to new heights.
